task.summary: fix: init. of parameter as a dictionary
refactor: default parameter is None within the arguments
fix: MATLAB -> python conversion indexing, etc. problems fixed.
fix: ordfilt2 serves as a median filter here
fix: incorrect matrix multiplications changed into elementwise multiplications.
fix: forgotten pitchTolUp initial parameter added.
fix: rounded numbers has to be converted to int.
feat: unit test functions added for MATLAB - python matrix comparison.
refactor: redundant libraries removed, comments added.
fix: fraction error due to 0 indexing fixed.

feat: unit test for DrumSoundSeparationNMF added.
* conv2 still doesn't give the same result as on MATLAB.
fix: numBins is not given as a parameter.
fix: V shouldn't be overwritten -> V_tmp defined as a new variable.
fix: costFunc defined as a numpy zeros array in stead of a list.
fix: if-else statement fixed (it's not a numeric; it's a numpy array)
